title: [K-12] Simulation Learning for AI-Based Rare Genetic Syndrome Diagnosis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics and Machine Learning Concepts Understanding
context.additional_context: Learning to resolve data bias and optimize AI diagnostic models using simulation tools in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Explain the operational principles of synthetic face image generation technology and argue the necessity of ensuring data diversity
Design experiments to improve the diagnostic accuracy of AI models by 15% or more using simulation-based learning tools
Analyze data bias factors based on race/age/gender and propose measures to enhance fairness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
